thread.section_title: Ben's Cycle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ben's Cycle | www.benscycle.com
thread.title: Ken G
thread.title_full: Ben's Cycle reviewed by Ken G

author: Ken G
title: Ken G
text: Ben's has many parts that makes restoring old road bikes fun. Most of the products I have purchased from Ben's would not be carried by my LBS and would be too much work to even try. Ben's makes it easy for old school bike geeks all it takes is a few clicks on your computer and it shows up at your front door a few days later.
